II.i.2.C.6.j
.
800 Series Work Items Requiring Verification of a Correct Address
800 series work items are system messages generated to assist ROs with identifying cases requiring follow up action.
Certain 800 series work items identified as
Work Item 810
:
Notice of Benefit Payment Transaction (
810WI) are commonly generated when a beneficiary’s address is not correct.
Reference
:  For more information on 800 series work items, see
M21-4, Appendix B, 3
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C - Mail Management
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section C
